segments.text: Let's go get something to eat .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Is there somewhere you wanted to go eat at ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: We can always go to the cafeteria and eat .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: The food there is pretty good .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: What kind of food do they serve ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You can get whatever you want at the cafeteria .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I have a taste for Chinese food .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: They have really good chow mein .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Okay , let's go to the cafeteria .
segments.speaker: S1
